class.name: OfferingEntity
class.comment: Table to store the offering information. Mapping file: sos/core/OfferingResource.hbm.xml

column.name: id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: domain
column.comment: The identifier of the offering, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Unique

column.name: codespace_id
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the offering, gml:name. If available, displyed in the contents of the Capabilites. Optional

column.name: codespace_name_id
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the offering, gml:description. Optional

column.name: sampling_time_start
column.comment: Time stamp when the offering was started or phenomenon was observed

column.name: sampling_time_end
column.comment: Time stamp when the offering was stopped or phenomenon was observed

column.name: result_time_start
column.comment: Time stamp when the offering was published or result was published/available

column.name: result_time_end
column.comment: Time stamp when the offering was published or result was published/available

column.name: valid_time_start
column.comment: Time stamp until when the offering is valid or results are valid

column.name: valid_time_end
column.comment: Time stamp until when the offering is valid or results are valid

set.name: children
set.comment: Relation table to store offering hierarchies. E.g. define a parent in a query and all childs are also contained in the response. Mapping file: sos/core/Offering.hbm.xml

set.name: observationTypes
set.comment: Table to store relations between offering and allowed observationTypes, defined in InsertSensor request

column.name: offering_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".id

column.name: observation_type_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related observationType. Contains "observationType".observationTypeId

set.name: relatedFeatures
set.comment: Table to store relations between offering and associated relatedFeatures

column.name: offering_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".id

column.name: related_feature_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related reladedFeature. Contains "reladed_feature".relatedFeatureId

set.name: featureTypes
set.comment: Table to store relations between offering and allowed featureOfInterestTypes, defined in InsertSensor request.

column.name: offering_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".id

column.name: feature_type_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related id. Contains "feature_type".id
